text: Gumgi mbari, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaara vhen kegap, mbe anan buni guari kaŋgi. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme fhura ndɨɨi bigɨna vhuuŋ, ana Hevenan kega zergim, mbe anan mparigi. Mbe vhɨra nza wari tɨgap Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ndigi. Mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen buna vhuuen mparav, mbe kaŋgi, mba buna vhuueŋ, ne guigira buna vhuueŋ ma. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋka khɨkhɨm mbararagi. Mba ŋkasŋka, ana zumgum Fhe Bakɨme kha nuiana ganɨnga tugar, ana za kɨrar hɨgɨrga. Mba bigi kaŋgi gumgi maaŋ muuŋgip regɨp, kɨr Fhe Bakɨme segɨrga, ana taagi mbe ndigi zɨrim, mbe ndavi dorgɨrga tuav ki fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana mba muuŋgi tɨv khaŋ muuŋgi. Ana nduara wom taagia Fhe Bakɨmen Kama ndi khanarareŋ ga tɨga fukfugim, mba gumgi bunin ana nzuav, ana nzɨɨi.
